医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
随着服药过量死亡人数上升，数百万阿片类药物和解基金未受影响蒙大拿州开始收到数百万美元用于投资应对阿片类药物危机近一年后，其中大部分资金仍未动用。与此同时，该州阿片类药物过量和死亡人数继续上升。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231213/Millions-in-opioid-settlement-funds-sit-untouched-as-overdose-deaths-rise.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231213/Millions-in-opioid-settlement-funds-sit-untouched-as-overdose-deaths-rise.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=20e380c9-cf62-473b-898e-dfa761a85573 Wed, 13 Dec 2023 07:24:52 -0500 Millions in opioid settlement funds sit untouched as overdose deaths rise
随着“兴奋性谵妄”诊断的基础破裂，影响蔓延当安杰洛·昆托 (Angelo Quinto) 的家人得知官员将他 2020 年的死亡归咎于“兴奋性谵妄”（这是他们以前从未听说过的一个术语）时，他们简直不敢相信。对他们来说，很明显诊断背后的科学依据并不真实。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231213/As-foundation-for-e28098excited-deliriume28099-diagnosis-cracks-fallout-spreads.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231213/As-foundation-for-e28098excited-deliriume28099-diagnosis-cracks-fallout-spreads.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f1d1852d-3673-4d7c-ab41-5701f6754604 Wed, 13 Dec 2023 07:21:39 -0500 As foundation for ‘excited delirium’ diagnosis cracks, fallout spreads
孕产妇接触大麻是否会增加与胎盘功能相关的不良妊娠结局的风险？研究人员评估了孕产妇使用大麻与胎盘功能相关的不良妊娠结局之间的关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231213/Is-maternal-cannabis-exposure-linked-with-increased-risk-of-adverse-pregnancy-outcomes-lated-to-placental-function.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231213/Is-maternal-cannabis-exposure-linked-with-increased-risk-of-adverse-pregnancy-outcomes-lated-to-placental-function.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b94ede94-a028-49f9-b512-9dacd35fcd74 Wed, 13 Dec 2023 06:46:00 -0500 Is maternal cannabis exposure associated with increased risk of adverse pregnancy outcomes related to placental function?
青春期早期和成年期间吸烟和体力活动的轨迹青春期和成年期之间具有相似行为模式的人口亚组。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231213/Trajectories-of-香烟-吸烟-和-物理-活动-之间-早期青春期-和-成人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231213/Trajectories-of-香烟-吸烟-和-物理-活动-之间-早期青春期-和-成人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a489b73d-78a2-47d2-a7e6-40adad835bba Wed, 13 Dec 2023 06:35:00 -0500 Trajectories of cigarette smoking and physical activity between early adolescence and adulthood
维生素 C 可以减轻普通感冒的严重程度吗？补充维生素 C 对普通感冒严重程度和持续时间的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231213/Can-vitamin-C-reduce-the-severity-of-the-common-cold.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231213/Can-vitamin-C-reduce-the-severity-of-the-common-cold.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=695f748d-8c94-4a76-a84f-e8ff360e313e Wed, 13 Dec 2023 06:01:00 -0500 Can vitamin C reduce the severity of the common cold?
COVID-19 的结果（包括严重的 COVID-19 和持续症状）是否与美国家庭的经济困难有关？研究人员调查了美国家庭的 COVID-19 健康状况、大流行期间的经济困难以及大流行前的社会经济状况之间的关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231213/Are-COVID-19-outcomes-包括-severe-COVID-19-and-persistent-symptoms-linked-with-economic-hardship-among-US-家庭.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231213/Are-COVID-19-outcomes-包括-severe-COVID-19-and-persistent-symptoms-linked-with-economic-hardship-among-US- family.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ce53a457-3a5d-441f-b83a-b8701bcd51c6 Wed, 13 Dec 2023 05:57:00 -0500 Are COVID-19 outcomes, including severe COVID-19 and persistent symptoms, associated with economic hardship among US families?
饮食和生活方式干预可降低多囊卵巢综合征患者的心脏代谢风险饮食和生活方式干预可能有助于降低多囊卵巢综合征女性的心脏代谢风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231213/Dietary-and-lifestyle-interventions-for-reducing-cardiometabolic-risk-in-PCOS.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231213/Dietary-and-lifestyle-interventions-for-reducing-cardiometabolic-risk-in-PCOS.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c207f2d2-b959-4b75-a2e5-396d80fb4f35 Wed, 13 Dec 2023 05:35:00 -0500 Dietary and lifestyle interventions for reducing cardiometabolic risk in PCOS
人工智能聊天机器人 GPT-4 在诊断中正确执行概率推理的能力与对人类临床医生的大型调查的比较研究人员通过评估诊断案例中的测试前和测试后概率估计，评估了生成式预训练 Transformer 4 (GPT-4) AI 与人类临床医生相比在概率推理方面的熟练程度。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231213/The-ability-of-the-AI-chatbot-GPT-4-to-properly-perform-probabilistic-reasoning-in-diagnosis-vs-a-人类临床医生大型调查.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231213/The-ability-of-the-AI-chatbot-GPT-4-to-properly-perform-probabilistic-reasoning-in-diagnosis-vs-a-人类临床医生大型调查.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=672de414-24e5-481e-9e1d-ecd9f0a95024 Wed, 13 Dec 2023 05:23:00 -0500 The ability of the AI chatbot GPT-4 to appropriately perform probabilistic reasoning in diagnosis vs a large survey of human clinicians
开发创新的机器人右心室来模仿心脏生物力学研究人员对右心室 (RV) 进行了建模，创建了一个复制右心室血流动力学和生物力学的机器人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231213/Innovative-robotic-right-ventricle-development-to-mimic-heart-biomechanics.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231213/Innovative-robotic-right-ventricle-development-to-mimic-heart-biomechanics.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=82c527b4-45b5-40b0-b74f-aca8fec07131 Wed, 13 Dec 2023 04:45:00 -0500 Innovative robotic right ventricle developed to mimic heart biomechanics
